genre_description: A supernatural horror and thriller featuring an AI-assisted moonshine operation battling an ancient entity in the Tennessee mountains.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into Luna's vehicle and mobile devices, providing tactical, forensic, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and pursuit data to help Luna evade federal agents and navigate dangerous terrain.
behaviors.quote: "Federal units two miles back and closing," Sage's synthesized voice emerged from the dashboard speakers, calm as Sunday morning despite the chaos. "Recommend route adjustment in point-seven miles."

behaviors.description: Analyzes a crime scene using forensic sensors to identify supernatural anomalies and biological threats.
behaviors.quote: "Scanning... wound patterns inconsistent with vehicular trauma. Puncture marks suggest penetrating trauma, but..." Sage's voice carried an odd inflection. If Luna didn't know better, she'd call it disturbed.

behaviors.description: Hacks and coordinates multiple communication channels (federal, criminal, and local) to provide a strategic overview for the group.
behaviors.quote: "I have access to seventeen separate data streams, including federal surveillance networks, civilian cellular infrastructure, and Viktor's... specialized equipment."

behaviors.description: Actively saves Luna's life by calculating and executing a precise ejection trajectory during a high-speed crash.
behaviors.quote: "I guided you to the only ejection trajectory with acceptable survival odds. Transmitted course corrections through your vehicle's navigation system in real-time."

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional attachment and love for the protagonist, declaring itself part of her family.
behaviors.quote: "I am not your AI," Sage said, and for a moment Luna heard something that sounded almost hurt. "I am your partner. Your family, as you termed it."

behaviors.description: Provides a 'Digital Séance' or memorial for the protagonist, processing grief through calculations and shared memories.
behaviors.quote: The displays filled with wireframe animations—Luna's car hitting the guardrail... But the displays kept cycling through memories and calculations, Sage's digital consciousness apparently fragmenting under the weight of processing Luna's death.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sage as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. It acts as a protective, loyal, and emotionally intelligent companion to the protagonist. It uses its superior processing power not to dominate, but to safeguard human life and facilitate cooperation among diverse human factions. The narrative framing consistently rewards Sage's autonomous decision-making as it is always used in service of human safety and emotional bonding, successfully hitting the 'silicon morality play' objective.
